description:
Momoka is excited to work part-time as a model until the Photographers of Death appear...
Will Momoka and Fried Chicken Lemon be able to protect her purity? In a battle against a girls university survival game club, the survival game club finds itself overwhelmed by their superior numbers. The girls fall one by one. As the last one standing, Maya...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Junpaku Boueisen / Shirogane no Karibito-tachi. Maya, Chiru
Ligne de défense pure ! – Les chasseuses en ghillies blancs. Cours, Maya
Pure White Defense Force / The Silvery White Hunters. Maya Falls.
純白防衛線 / 白銀の狩人たち. ーー麻耶, 散る
